about_the_game:
What is TNTODION?

TNTODION is a game in which you can plunge into the fantastic world of dreams, travel through various locations in which you need to solve puzzles. By solving puzzles, you also learn a bit about the history of the game.

Who is the main antagonist?

The main antagonist is a killer robot - Benzon Lowith, who escaped from the secret laboratory 404. He comes running to us and starts hunting for us, since his initial task is to catch people for experiments.

What is our task?

Your task is to escape Benzon Lowith from the apartment. To do this, you must take the key and go to the main exit.

What's in the basement?

In the basement is a secret laboratory 404, which you will have to go into. Once there, you will need to solve a puzzle.

Are there other characters in the game besides Benzon Lowith?

Yes, your friend Toby is also present in the first part of the game, who will help you with the training. Later, he will appear only at the end of the game, where he will talk about your achievements.

How to find out the current task?

To do this, you must hold down the "Tab" key until it appears. You will be told about all the available keys in the game in the tutorial.
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/task_eng.png

Will there be more chapters in the game?

Yes, this game will have more locations in the future.

What is the game based on?

The game is based on dreams. For several years I wrote down all the nightmares that I had. Now, it's all in the game!

How to get the "Waiting" achievement?

In order to get this achievement, you must wait 10 minutes at the counter in the location with the bus.
